text: The Schwaben Open is a professional tennis tournament played on clay courts. It is currently part of the Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP) Challenger Tour. It is held annually in Augsburg, Germany since 2019, replacing the IsarOpen. ==Past finals== ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runner-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2019 || Yannick Hanfmann || Emil Ruusuvuori || 2–6, 6–4, 7–5 |} ===Doubles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champions !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2019 || Andrei Vasilevski Igor Zelenay || Ivan Sabanov Matej Sabanov || 4–6, 6–4, [10–3] |} ==References== Category:ATP Challenger Tour Category:Clay court tennis tournaments Category:Tennis tournaments in Germany Category:Augsburg
title: Schwaben Open
